name: INRideFareLineItem
desc: A specific type of ride-related charge.

items.name: init!(title: String!, price: NSDecimalNumber!, currencyCode: String!)
items.desc: Initializes the line item object with the specified title and pricing information.

items.name: var title: String!
items.desc: The localized string containing a description of the charge.

items.name: var price: NSDecimalNumber!
items.desc: The cost value of the line item.

items.name: var currencyCode: String!
items.desc: The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to the price information.
